author: Sponsored
title: Lords Mobile creator IGG donates $100,000 to Make-A-Wish
description: This is just one of several remarkable charitable projects IGG has made happen.
content:
A few weeks ago we reported on the winner of a competition held by IGG, maker of the brilliant multiplayer game Lords Mobile for mobile and PC.
Contestants were asked to design a castle, one that would eventually feature in the game itself. You can check out… [+2325 chars]
